repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Edward Heisler Collection of Southern Pacific Railroad Operating Crafts Union Organizing Documents
did.abstract: Documents on the organizing effort of the Southern Pacific Rail Road Operating Crafts (SPROC) Union, collected by Edward Heisler

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Ed Heisler was Secretary of the Right to Vote Committee of the United Transportation Union.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of documents on the organizing effort of the Southern Pacific Rail Road Operating Crafts (SPROC) Union, collected by Edward Heisler. Included are corespondence, memoranda, flyers, and newspaper clippings relating to the organizing, as well as the Right to Vote Committee of the United Transportation Union.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Edward Heisler Collection of Southern Pacific Railroad Operating Crafts Union Organizing Documents #5183. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
